title: Matiks Raises $3.1M in Series A Funding
description: The math gaming app Matiks announced today that it has raised $3.1 million in Series A funding...
content: Matiks, the popular math gaming app, has secured $3.1 million in Series A funding led by EdTech Ventures...
author: TechCrunch

title: How Matiks is Making Math Fun Again
description: A deep dive into the app that's getting students addicted to learning...
content: In a world where math anxiety is common, Matiks has found a way to make learning mathematics engaging...
author: EdTech Weekly
